text: Hanna Beata Gronkiewicz-Waltz (born 4 December 1952 in Warsaw) is a Polish lawyer, economist, and politician. She was president of National Bank of Poland (1992-2001), vicepresident of European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (2001-2004). She is also viceleader of Civic Platform. In 2013 she received the title of Professor. In 2014 she has been again elected for Mayor of Warsaw. In 2018 she ended her term and did not run for the next one. == References == ==Other websites== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Bankers Category:Mayors of Warsaw Category:Polish businesspeople Category:MEPs for Poland
title: Hanna Gronkiewicz-Waltz
